compassion:
同情 
a feeling of wanting to help someone who is sick, hungry, in trouble, etc. 
137
viable:
可实施的；切实可行的 
capable of working successfully; feasible
inflict:
使承受，使遭受 
to cause someone to experience or be affected by (something unpleasant or harmful)
seductive:
性感的；撩人的 
sexually attractive

非常吸引人的；诱惑的；有魅力的 
making someone do or want something; very attractive
custodian:
看守人，保管人 
someone who keeps and protects something valuable for another person
scrupulous:
严格认真的，一丝不苟的 
very careful about doing something correctly
panacea:
万能药 
a remedy for all ills or difficulties; cure-all
rivet:
吸引 
to attract and hold all of someone's attention

使固定 
to fasten (something) with rivets
fallacy:
谬论，谬见 
a wrong belief; a false or mistaken idea
bestow:
赠与 
to give (something) as a gift or honor
submission:
提交 
an act of giving a document, proposal, piece of writing, etc., to someone so that it can be 
considered or approved

投降，屈服 
the state of being obedient; the act of accepting the authority or control of someone else
imminent:
即将发生的 
happening very soon
apprehension:
忧虑，担心 
fear that something bad or unpleasant is going to happen; a feeling of being worried about 
the future 
138
reverse:
相反的 
opposite to what is usual or stated

颠倒 
to change (something) to an opposite state or condition
terror:
恐惧 
a very strong feeling of fear

恐怖活动 
violence that is committed by a person, group, or government in order to frighten people 
and achieve a political goal
embroider:
在 上刺绣 
to decorate fabric with a pattern of stitches usually using coloured thread

对 加以渲染或修饰；给 添枝加叶 
to make a story more interesting by adding details that are not true
periphery:
边缘 
the outside edge of an area; the area that surrounds a place or thing
disarm:
解除武装 
to take weapons from (someone or something)

消除怒气，敌意等 
to make (someone) friendly or less suspicious
pulpit:
布道坛 
a raised platform where a priest or minister stands when leading a worship service
creek:
小海湾；小港湾 
a narrow area of water where the sea flows into the land
autocrat:
独裁者 
a person who rules with total power
beneficent:
仁慈的，慈爱的 
doing or producing good
deceptive:
欺骗的 
intended to make someone believe something that is not true
potency:
影响力；支配力；效力 
the power that somebody/something has to affect your body or mind
undaunted:
勇敢无畏的 
courageously resolute especially in the face of danger or difficulty
susceptible:
易受 影响的，易受伤的 
easily affected, influenced, or harmed by something
forestall:
预先阻止，抢在 之前行动 
to prevent or obstruct (an anticipated event or action) by taking action ahead of time
perverse:
执拗的；任性的；不通情理的 
showing deliberate determination to behave in a way that most people think is wrong, 
unacceptable or unreasonable
courtship:
求爱；求婚 
the activities that occur when people are developing a romantic relationship that could lead 
to marriage or the period of time when such activities occur
wily:
诡计多端的 
full of clever tricks; very clever
deity:
神明 
a god or goddess
cohesion:
凝聚，凝聚力 
a condition in which people or things are closely united
maritime:
与海有关的 
of or relating to sailing on the sea or doing business (such as trading) by sea
pathos:
痛苦，感染力 
a quality that causes people to feel sympathy and sadness
archetypal:
典型的 
having all the important qualities and characteristics that make somebody/something a 
typical example of a particular kind of person or thing
courtesy:
礼貌的举止 
polite behavior that shows respect for other people

客气话 
something that you say to be polite especially when you meet someone
inexplicable:
费解的；无法解释的 
that cannot be understood or explained
sheen:
光辉，光泽，光彩 
a soft, smooth, shiny quality

闪耀，发光 
to be bright; show a sheen 
140
avian:
鸟 类 的；关于鸟类 的 
of or connected with birds
syndrome:
综合症 
a disease or disorder that involves a particular group of signs and symptoms

典型特征 
a set of concurrent things (such as emotions or actions) that usually form an identifiable pattern
diverting:
娱乐的，消遣的，令人快乐的 
providing amusement or entertainment
intact:
完整的，完好无损的 
not broken or damaged; having every part
congenial:
志同道合的 
agreeably suited to one's nature, tastes, or outlook
genus:
动植物的属 
a group into which animals, plants, etc. that have similar characteristics are divided, smaller

perpetual:
永久的 
continuing forever or for a very long time without stopping

不断发生的 
happening all the time or very often
obliterate:
毁掉；覆盖；清除 
to remove all signs of something, either by destroying or covering it completely
bard:
诗人 
a person who writes poems 
141
detract:
减损，转移，使分心 
to reduce the strength, value, or importance of (something)
comradeship:
友谊，同志情谊

hyperbole:
夸张

推翻，撤销 判决

staggering:
令人大吃一惊的，令人震惊的

discord:
不一致；不和；纷争 
lack of agreement between people, ideas, etc.
wince:
畏缩

tame:
驯化 
to make (an animal) tame

驯服的 
not wild; trained to obey people
parity:
尤指薪金或地位平等，相同，对等 
the state of being equal, especially the state of having equal pay or status
commotion:
骚动 
noisy excitement and confusion
flutter:
使 飘动，挥动，颤动 
to move lightly and quickly; to make something move in this way

鸟或昆虫拍 翅 ，振 翅 ，鼓 翼

quickly up and down

振动；飘动；挥动；颤动 
a quick, light movement 
142
at_the_behest_of:
按 的吩咐，应 的要求 
because someone has asked or ordered you to do something
plumage:
全身羽毛

pigment:
给 着色 
to color with or as if with pigment

色素，颜料 
a substance that gives color to something else
lame:
人或动物瘸的；跛的

借口、解释等站不住脚的；无说服力的

elastic:
有弹性的 
able to return to an original shape or size after being stretched, squeezed, etc.
devoid:
缺乏的，全无的 
not having (something usual or expected); completely without (something)
plead:
为 辩护

恳求 
to ask for something in a serious and emotional way
frugal:
节约的，节俭的

disengage:
使脱离 
to separate from someone or something
aggregate:
集合，聚集 
to join or combine into a single group

合计的，集合的 
formed by adding together two or more amounts
delirious:
神志昏迷的

sweeping:
彻底的；广泛的 
including or involving many things; wide in range or amount

throng:
一大群

蜂拥而至

pamper:

industrious:
勤奋的；刻苦的

alleviate:
减轻 
to reduce the pain or trouble of (something); to make (something) less painful, difficult, or severe
corrosive:
腐蚀性的

adversarial:
对立的

anecdote:
佚事；趣闻

jigsaw:

perennial:

不断出现的
